name: Duel of Death
description:
Duel of Death is a chaotic fast-paced top down shooter where you use magic to defeat Osseus and his endless skeletons.

Made in 10 days for GameDevTV's game jam 2022 for the theme "Death is only the beginning"

  • Deal massive amounts of damage with your giant AOE spell Pyrogram
  • Fireball your way through hundreds of skeletons and try to defeat their master Osseus
  • Skilfully dodge incoming attacks by Teleporting away

Can you defeat Osseus and send him back to his grave? After all - death is only the beginning...

CONTROLS

  • Move - WASD
  • Aim - Move Mouse
  • Fireball - Left Mouse Button
  • Pyrogram - Right Mouse Button
  • Teleport - Spacebar

CREDITS

  • Programmer - Fuzzy Giraffe
  • Artist - Happy Giraffe
  • Music - https://freesound.org/s/591376/
  • Font - https://www.dafont.com/rainyhearts.font
